meta.description: Optimize the number of sedans and buses to purchase to minimize the total number of vehicles while meeting customer and pollution constraints.

sets.name: VEHICLES
sets.description: Types of vehicles available for purchase.

params.name: pollution
params.description: Pollution units produced per vehicle type.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of vehicles to purchase of each type.

objective.name: min_total_vehicles
objective.description: Minimize the total number of vehicles purchased.

constraints.name: pollution_limit
constraints.description: Total pollution must not exceed 800 units per day.

constraints.name: customer_requirement
constraints.description: Total seating capacity must accommodate at least 4600 customers per day.
